title: ld: can't map file, errno=22 file '/Library/Frameworks/cuda.framework' for architecture x86_64 (Mac OS X, CUDA 9.2)
body_html:
I attempted to build PyTorch with Mac OS X, Clang 9.0 and CUDA 9.2, but I got this error when linking caffe2_gpu.dylib

ld: can't map file, errno=22 file '/Library/Frameworks/cuda.framework' for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)

Not really sure what is going on. Will keep this updated.

Not really sure what is going on. Will keep this updated.
body:
I attempted to build PyTorch with Mac OS X, Clang 9.0 and CUDA 9.2, but I got this error when linking `caffe2_gpu.dylib`

```
ld: can't map file, errno=22 file '/Library/Frameworks/cuda.framework' for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
```

Not really sure what is going on. Will keep this updated.
